2.1.6.name: wordpress/comment-notifier
2.1.6.description:
Comment Notifier by Satollo lets user to subscribe the comment thread of each single post of your blog. It improves traffic and loyalty.

Notification emails are fully customizable (both plain text or html) with a number of "tags" to insert author name, post link and title, receiver name and so on.

The "subscribe me" checkbox can be added automatically or manually.

Try it and believe me: it worths.

In deep documentation on Comment Notifier official page.

My plugins:

  • Protector
  • Post Layout
  • Post Layout Pro
  • Other Posts
  • Newsletter
